SEARCH
Package seng201.team53.game.round

Class GameRound

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.round.GameRound
public class GameRound extends Object
Represents a single round in the game Each round has a number, a list of cart and a set of actions to be preformed at the end of the round

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameRound(int roundNumber)
    Constructs a new game round with the specified round number

    Adds a new action to be preformed at the end of the round Used for temporary random tower events where stats are changed only for the given round

    • addCart

      public void addCart(int maxCapacity, float velocity, ResourceType resourceType, javafx.util.Duration spawnDelay)
      Adds a new cart to the round
      Parameters:
      maxCapacity - The maximum capacity of the cart
      velocity - The velocity of the cart in tiles per second
      resourceType - The type of resource the cart accepts
      spawnDelay - The delay before the cart spawns

    • runRoundEndActions

      public void runRoundEndActions()
      Runs all the actions that are set to be preformed at the end of the round

    • addOnRoundEndAction

      public void addOnRoundEndAction(Runnable runnable)
      Adds a new action to be preformed at the end of the round Used for temporary random tower events where stats are changed only for the given round
      Parameters:
      runnable - The action to be added

    • roundWon

      public boolean roundWon()
      Checks if the round has been won by making sure all the carts are full
      Returns:
      true if the round was one, false otherwise
